statements: SELECT activity_time, activity_description FROM FraudMonitoring
SELECT user_id, is_fraudulent FROM FraudMonitoring WHERE is_fraudulent = true
SELECT * FROM FraudMonitoring ORDER BY activity_time DESC
SELECT id, activity_description, user_id FROM FraudMonitoring WHERE user_id = 123
SELECT id, activity_time, activity_description FROM FraudMonitoring WHERE activity_time > '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM FraudMonitoring WHERE is_fraudulent = TRUE;
SELECT id, activity_description FROM FraudMonitoring WHERE user_id = 123 ORDER BY activity_time DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_activities FROM FraudMonitoring GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_activities > 5;
SELECT * FROM FraudMonitoring WHERE activity_description ILIKE '%fraud%' AND is_fraudulent = FALSE;
SELECT id, activity_time, activity_description FROM FraudMonitoring WHERE activity_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT * FROM fraudulent_activities;
SELECT activity_type, activity_description FROM fraudulent_activities ORDER BY activity_date DESC;
SELECT report_id, reporter_name, report_date FROM fraud_reporting WHERE fraud_activity_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM fraudulent_activities WHERE activity_type = 'Identity Theft';
SELECT id, activity_type, activity_description, activity_date FROM fraudulent_activities WHERE activity_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM fraudulent_activities WHERE activity_type='financial fraud' ORDER BY activity_date DESC;
SELECT activity_type, activity_description FROM fraudulent_activities WHERE id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY id;
SELECT * FROM fraudulent_activities WHERE activity_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';

SELECT report_id, reporter_name, report_date, activity_type FROM fraud_reporting JOIN fraudulent_activities ON fraud_reporting.fraud_activity_id = fraudulent_activities.id WHERE activity_type='identity theft';
SELECT * FROM fraudulent_activities WHERE activity_type='credit card fraud' AND activity_description LIKE '%stolen%' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users ORDER BY registration_date DESC;
SELECT email FROM users WHERE registration_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT activity_description, activity_date FROM fraudulent_activities WHERE detected_by = 'John Smith';
SELECT report_id, report_date FROM reports WHERE user_id = 123 AND activity_id = 456 ORDER BY report_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE registration_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT a.id, a.activity_description, r.report_date, u.username FROM fraudulent_activities a JOIN reports r ON a.id = r.activity_id JOIN users u ON r.user_id = u.user_id;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(report_id) AS total_reports FROM reports GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY total_reports DESC;
SELECT * FROM fraudulent_activities WHERE activity_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM fraudulent_activities;
SELECT activity_type, user_id FROM fraudulent_activities WHERE activity_type='fraud';
SELECT activity_id, report_date, reported_by FROM fraudulent_activities ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT detail_description FROM activity_details WHERE reported_by='admin' LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, fraud_type FROM user_reports WHERE fraud_type='scam' AND report_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM fraudulent_activities ORDER BY report_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) as total_activities FROM fraudulent_activities GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_activities > 1;
SELECT activity_type, COUNT(*) as total_activities FROM fraudulent_activities GROUP BY activity_type;
SELECT user_id, fraud_type, MAX(report_date) as latest_report_date FROM user_reports GROUP BY user_id, fraud_type;
SELECT * FROM activity_details JOIN fraudulent_activities ON activity_details.activity_id = fraudulent_activities.activity_id ORDER BY activity_details.detail_id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT activity_id, user_id, activity_description FROM FraudulentActivities;
SELECT report_id, activity_id, report_date, reporter_id, report_description FROM ReportedActivities ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT username, email, phone_number FROM SuspectUsers WHERE registration_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY registration_date ASC;
SELECT investigator_id, log_date, log_details FROM InvestigationLogs WHERE log_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT pattern_id, pattern_description, confirmed_fraud FROM FraudulentPatterns WHERE detection_date >= '2022-07-01';
SELECT * FROM FraudulentActivities ORDER BY activity_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, activity_description FROM FraudulentActivities WHERE reported_by = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT DISTINCT user_id, COUNT(activity_id) AS total_activities FROM FraudulentActivities GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(activity_id) > 3;

SELECT activity_id, activity_description, report_description, investigator_id FROM FraudulentActivities JOIN ReportedActivities ON FraudulentActivities.activity_id = ReportedActivities.activity_id JOIN InvestigationLogs ON ReportedActivities.report_id = InvestigationLogs.report_id;
SELECT pattern_id, pattern_description, detection_date FROM FraudulentPatterns WHERE confirmed_fraud = TRUE ORDER BY detection_date DESC LIMIT 5;
